name: Flappy-2048: Modern White Edition
description:
What happens when you combine two of the trending, most addictive games on the AppStore? You get Flappy 2048!

Flappy 2048 combines the addicting but simple gameplay of Flappy Bird and the addicting puzzle game 2048 to give you the ultimate addicting game!

[HOW TO PLAY]
Tap to go up
Let go to fall
Avoid the pipes
Only pick up identical numbers!

*Please leave us a nice review if you enjoy this game!*
*As we cannot reply to AppStore reviews, please contact us at apprepublicllc@gmail.com for support!*
